name: Eric Gabriel von Rosén
obverse: Bust of Eric Gabriel von Rosén facing right.
obverse_inscriptions: E. G. A ROSÉN L. B. DICAST. HOLM. A. H. PRAES. RR. OO. EQV. ET C.
reverse_inscriptions: PIETAS R. ACAD. MUSIC. D. II MAII MDCCCLXI.
references: Musica in Nummis: Beschreibendes Verzeichnis von Medailleurarbeiten #252
description: Eric Gabriel von Rosén was a justice of the Supreme Court of Sweden and a church musician.
